title: First aid on the dairy farm
creator_credit: Jack Rogers, Cineservice and Tasmanian Government Film Unit
brief_description: Cases in which the farmer can be of immediate aid to his animals, before calling the veterinarian. The film deals with milk fever, pink eye, mastitis, teat injuries, administration of medicine, bloat, choke, prussic acid poisoning, wounds, first aid kit.
